form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: HAVERford Township Bureau of Police, NARA, 8/17/202

full_text: HAVERFORD TOWNSHIP BUREAU OF POLICE DARBY AND MANOA ROADS, HAVERTOWN, PA. DATE: 4/10/78 To Immigration Department From Haverford Twp. Police Department Subject NGUYEN VAN MINH Resided at 17 W. Hillcrest Road, Havertown, Pa. for almost 2 yrs. (August 1975 to November 1977). 4/10/78 DATE NO CRIMINAL RECORD WITHIN THE JURISDICTION OF HAVERFORD TOWNSHIP. Lt. Charle R. Angstadh Lieutenant Charles R. Angstadt adm SIGNATURE
